attributes.action: Foreign Offenders Embassy to pay for Interpreter, Doctor and solicitor fees
attributes.additional_details: Foreign offenders who are caught by the police are to have their embassy informed in this country and then it is the responsibility of their Embassy to pay any Interpreters fees and also if a solicitor is required then the Embassy pay the solicitors fees likewise if a doctor is needed then the Embassy pays .  This would save millions of pounds of taxpayers money
